channel.title: Server Advertisement
channel.description:
Ok, so i went to post my server on the server advertisment thingy, anyways i posted it all fine and whatever did the server name, port, and IP, i then sent the link to my hoster to verifie for me i registered the username and passworn on my server then logged out, but it still will not post!!
Iv try like atleast 30+ times, and its really starting to piss me off! so if anyone knows how to post the server correctly please let me know? thanks!

item.title: Server Advertisement
item.dc:creator: @hydravision hydravision
item.description:
@hydravision wrote:

Tobbescape:

Wait till it gets confirmed.

Did u not read what i said? i said it wont post asin it wont get fucking confirmed!!! I can keep and retrying but the same fucking thing works… and to the comment above im glad im not the only one LOL!!

Read full topic

and waiting dont work cuz ive been wating for 3/4 month’s … and tryed atleast 100 times
